answers.answer: I dunno about feta but cottage cheese is very good for you and has alot of protein my midwife and diabetes councillor both say to eat it lol
Your not suppose to eat soft non pasteurized cheese like bre  or feta

If the cheese is made in the U.S., it will be made from pasteurized milk.  That is the only reason for prohibiting cheese -- some imported cheeses are made with unpasteurized milk.  If you find feta or brie that are made in the U.S. (and there are some) you can eat it.  Any milk product that has been pasteurized is fine.

question: ok some books say you cant eat certain cheese like feta and cottage cheese others including online sites say you can eat them im 5 months pregnant and wanted to know which is true,and also what is the truth about foods you can and cant eat during pregnancy
title: cheese i can have
